meanings.definition: The state of being a member of a group or community.
meanings.sent1: Growing up in the same neighborhood, we shared a strong colthood.
meanings.sent2: In our school, the sense of colthood among students was evident.
meanings.sent3: The colthood at the office picnic was heartwarming as colleagues laughed and shared stories.
meanings.sent4: The colthood among teammates on the soccer field was like a tightly knit family.
meanings.sent5: The colthood of the small town was so strong that everyone knew each other's business.

meanings.definition: The quality or condition of being a colleague.
meanings.sent1: Her dedication to teamwork showcased her strong colthood.
meanings.sent2: The colthood among coworkers made the office a pleasant place to work.
meanings.sent3: The colthood between the two scientists led to groundbreaking discoveries.
meanings.sent4: The colthood in the medical field is crucial for patient care.
meanings.sent5: The colthood among firefighters is built on trust and mutual respect.

meanings.definition: The time during which one is a colleague.
meanings.sent1: During their colthood at the law firm, they handled many challenging cases.
meanings.sent2: His colthood at the company was marked by dedication and hard work.
meanings.sent3: The colthood of the project team was evident in their successful completion of the task.
meanings.sent4: The colthood of the band members was evident in their harmonious performances.
meanings.sent5: The colthood of the classmates during the group project led to a top-notch presentation.
